title: Moderating the Namada Discord community for almost 2 years. Participation in all testing Currently running a validator in dry-run. Participating in the CB program for community involvement During the active development of language communities - holding calls for the Russian-speaking community and writing translations of guides and blog.
category: Product & Project Management, Community & Business Development, Research, Analysis & Compliance
description: I've been moderating the Discord community for two years, answering questions, assisting with testing, and fighting scammers. Helped during major news events, hosted AMA calls for native lang group, and created translations and structured guides
notes:
My moderation of the community is still ongoing.
Participeted in all tesnets and CB
Translates + AMAs in native languages
I'm taking part in a dry run


There are ideas, but budgets are needed, but I am not ready to spend even more of my own funds now, since I have already given so much to Namada over the past 2 years.
Some of the activities are on pause
It is difficult to support this on a volunteer basis. 
So if there are some incentives, it will help to move forward and do more.

skills.subcategory: Other: Content Creation and Community Engagement
